name: Andrélon Haarmasker 1 minuut oil en care
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Behentrimonium Chloride, Lactic Acid, Glycerin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil (Amandelolie), Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Arganolie), Cocos Nucifera Oil (Kokosolie), Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil (Marula-olie), Dipropylene Glycol, Parfum, Petrolatum, Amodimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, PEG-180M, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, Linalool, CI 19140.
